content.text:
# Historical Society of Michigan

The Historical Society of Michigan (HSM) is the official historical society of the State of Michigan. It was founded in 1828 by Territorial Governor Lewis Cass.
See also
* List of historical societies in Michigan
References
External links
* [https://www.hsmichigan.org Historical Society of Michigan official website]
* [https://www.jstor.org/publisher/histsocmich Historical Society of Michigan] at JSTOR
*
